title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #92
body:
## Date and Time

Aug 30, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [The Merge](https://ethereumcatherders.com/the_merge/)â€Š
   - Mainnet Merge [Announcement](https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/08/24/mainnet-merge-announcement)
- [Merge Data Challenge](https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/08/26/finalized-no-37)

### 2. Events & hackathon
- [Stanford SBC](https://cbr.stanford.edu/sbc22/) 8/29/2022 - 8/31/2022
- [MCON](https://www.mcon.fun/) - 9/15/2022 - 9/17/2022
- [ETHOnline](https://online.ethglobal.com/) - 9/1/2022 - 9/30/2022
- [Mainnet](https://mainnet.events/home) Sep 21-23, 2022
- [ETHIndia](https://ethindia.co/) Dec 2nd - 4th, 2022
- [Devcon session ideas](https://hackmd.io/-hWk6rw4QYecUZ0MiJML_Q?view)

### 4. ECH updates
- ECH Stats.
    - Discord - Over 1000 users
- [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
  - GitPOAP badges available 
  - ECH podcast page - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/51
  -  Recording auto-update -  https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/18
  -  Network Upgrade
       - Arrow Glacier -  https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/54
       - Gray Glacier - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/55
       - The Merge Page -  https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/58
       - Altair Upgrade - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/61
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - [EIP bot](https://github.com/ethereum/EIP-Bot/issues) & [EIPV](https://github.com/ethereum/eipv/issues)
  - [Learn2Earn](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- ECH Operations 
   - ECH GitHub backup & [YouTube backup](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/ECHBackup)
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- GitPOAP for ACD meeting 150, CL meeting 100 & The Merge
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 

  - All Core Dev meeting notes 144
  - Consensus meeting notes 94
  - EIP Improvement Process meeting 63    
     - Contact author of EIP-712

**Other community meetings**
  - All Wallet Dev meeting # 4 [Recording](https://youtu.be/leEdlaZjc6I)
  - EIP editors apprentice meeting 24 [Recording](https://youtu.be/AWKNTty5xc4)
     - EIP Editing Office Hour [Announcement](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/introducing-eip-editing-office-hour-9f04a95a26ba)  
  - KZG-Ceremony Breakout Call # 6 [Recording](https://youtu.be/6LsVjf9qARI)

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 91](https://github.com/darkfire-rain/PM-1/edit/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20091.md)

#### The date for the next meeting - Sep 13, 2022. 

 (Anything else, leave a comment.)
